General.Name: Kwang Ming Silk Mill Co Ltd
General.Description: Kwang Ming Silk Mill Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of polyester processing yarn. The company offers composite, special functionality, and synthetic fiber fabrics, as well as man-made fiber products. It is also involved in the real estate leasing and related activities. The company's products are used for fashion clothing, environmentally friendly recycled polyester, outdoor leisure sports fabrics, bridal gowns, high-end trademarks, linings, fashionable urban apparel fabrics, and shoe and home decoration fabrics. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
